title: April 24, 2024 — Managing Listings using SQL | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: Snowflake is pleased to announce the preview of Managing listings using SQL.

You can now create,
alter,
describe,
show, and
drop the contents of a listing using SQL commands.
You cannot use SQL commands to offer paid, personalized listings, or listings on private data exchanges.
For a complete set of limitations and restrictions see Limitations of managing listings using SQL.
For details, see About managing listings using SQL.
